pageContext.claim: “So we have 325 million people. China has 1.5 billion people, right? We paid $500 million a year [to the World Health Organization]. They paid $39 million a year. In addition to that, they had guys -- And for this I give them credit, but they had guys that practically ran the place, right? So they're paying $39, and we're paying $500, and we have a smaller population.”
pageContext.analysis: The WHO is an international organization and China does not have "total control" over it nor do they "run the place." By removing the USA from the WHO, Trump ensures that the United States will have even less influence.
